entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
